items.sentence: Even though I felt that there was something strange, I just didn't know what it was.
Whenever I talk to my father, I realize that he has a lot more experience than I do.
If you put your mind to it, you can do it, and if you don't, you won't get anywhere.
There isn't only one right answer, but that doesn't mean there are no wrong answers.
Tom wanted to study French, but Mr. Jackson suggested that he study English instead.
